name: Suspense (Working Title)
description:
A work-in-progress personal project.

Feel free to give it a try!

You're a Mad Scientist! Run through levels collecting Science Points by fighting off crazed experiments.

Controls for Keyboard & Mouse:

  • WASD or Arrow keys  -  Movement
  • Space  -  Jump
  • Mouse  -  Aiming and Shooting
  • E key  -  Read Signs

Controls for Gamepad:

  • Left Joystick   -  Movement
  • A / X Button  -  Jump
  • Right Joystick  -  Aiming
  • Right Shoulder Trigger  -  Shooting
  • Y / Triangle Button  -  Read Signs

Coming Soon:

  • More Levels!
  • Music
  • New Weapons
  • More Enemy Types
  • Bug Fixes
  • Grappling Hook?
